name: Air hockey pinball VR
description:
Fun little VR- game that has a silly twist with air hockey and pinball together! This game's all about getting a good score and it is easy to master. I'm wishing you all the best!

Notice: Game has many unsolved bugs. Because this is a school project, these bugs probably would not get fixed any time soon.

Credits:

Unity - VR Setup (VR starter project)

Sampsa - Game maker
